snippet.title: CHIRAL Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now to WISHLIST
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3106330/Chiral/?beta=1
Epic Store Page: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/chiral-f23600

In Chiral, a sci-fi psychological horror/comedy first person puzzle game, you'll assume the role of a disembodied brain in a jar, paired with a digital AI companion. Together, you'll navigate a labyrinth of mirror, laser, and gravity puzzles that will challenge your spatial reasoning and leave you both laughing and bewildered.

Welcome to DominioTech, where the future of employment has taken a chilling turn. After a "routine" brain transfer procedure, you find yourself in a jar, but don't worry—you'll still be a valuable asset to the corporation! As you traverse the eerie and captivating levels, you'll encounter corrupted turrets, digital overlords, and a cast of characters with more than a few screws loose.

Key Features:

Mind-Bending Puzzles: Test your intellect with complex mirror, laser, and gravity challenges that will twist your perception and ignite your curiosity.
Dark Humor: Enjoy a storyline infused with a creepy yet comedic tone, reminiscent of your favorite twisted tales of corporate dystopia.
Unique Mechanics: Utilize your ability to cross through mirrors, manipulate objects, and alter gravity.
Atmospheric World: Immerse yourself in the unsettlingly delightful corporate dystopia with a brutalist foundation sprinkled with some cartoony augmented reality.

Prepare for an adventure that blends eerie environments with laugh-out-loud moments. Are you ready to outwit DominioTech's finest and uncover the secrets lurking within the corporate machine? Your mind is the key—use it wisely, or face the consequences!

Enter Chiral and embrace the madness. Your brain will never be the same again.
